titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the application of the luxury automobile excise tax the value of components required for a vehicle to be powered by clean-burning fuel, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5759-5760)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6207-6209)

bill.summary: 5/16/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the application of the luxury automobile excise tax the value of components required for a vehicle to be powered by clean-burning fuel, including components enabling a vehicle to qualify as an electric vehicle.
